com.stormpath.sdk.query

Interface Options

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AccountCriteria, AccountOptions<T>, AccountStoreMappingCriteria, AccountStoreMappingOptions<T>, AccountStoreOptions<T>, ApiKeyCriteria, ApiKeyOptions<T>, ApplicationCriteria, ApplicationOptions<T>, DirectoryCriteria, DirectoryOptions<T>, GroupCriteria, GroupOptions<T>, TenantOptions<T>

    public interface Options
    An Options instance represents one or more customizations to apply when retrieving Resources.
    Since:
    0.8
    See Also:
    AccountOptions, GroupOptions, ApplicationOptions, DirectoryOptions, TenantOptions

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isEmpty()
      Returns true if this Options instance is empty (does not contain any options), false otherwise.

    • Method Detail

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Returns true if this Options instance is empty (does not contain any options), false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if this Options instance is empty (does not contain any options), false otherwise.
